name: Haritha Mandanapu
summary: Experienced full-stack engineer with 10+ years building scalable, secure web applications using React, Node.js, Java, and AWS. Passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and AI-driven development.

Proven track record in platform engineering, SRE practices, and cross-functional collaboration. Enthusiastic problem-solver, mentor, and lifelong learner focused on delivering impactful digital solutions.
